stockexchange.model

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockexchange.model.Portfolio

  • public class Portfolio
extends java.lang.Object
    Portfolio class describes each portfolio in the stock exhange. Each portfolio has number of shares and it is capable of calculating profit and overall cost basis.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Portfolio(java.lang.String name)
      Constructor that initialises the Portfolio object by the given name of the portfolio and shares.

      • setEachCommission

        public void setEachCommission(double commission)
        Sets the value of the commission.
        Parameters:

      • displayShare

        public java.lang.String displayShare(java.lang.String nameOfShare,
                                     java.lang.String date)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Displays the details of the specified shares on the specified date.
        Parameters:
        nameOfShare - is the ticker symbol of the share whose details need to be known
        date - the date in YYYY-MM-DD format
        Returns:
        the following information - Ticker Symbol of the share - Opening Price - Highest Price of the Day - Lowest Price of the day - Closing Price - Volume of the shares
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the ticker symbol of the shares is incorrect or if the date is not given
        java.io.IOException

      • buyShare

        public void buyShare(java.lang.String name,
                     int quantity)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Buy the specified number of shares of the specified company.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the company whose stocks are intended to be bought
        quantity - is the quantity of the intended stocks
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Quantity of shares exceed the Quantity available for sale or if the Quantity of the shares is less than 1

      • sellShare

        public void sellShare(java.lang.String shareToRemove,
                      java.lang.String date)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sells the shares of the specified company.
        Parameters:
        shareToRemove - is the ticker symbol of the company
        date - on which share is to be sold
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are multiple shares of the same company bought on different dates or the specified ShareCompany does not exists in the portfolio

      • sellShare

        public void sellShare(java.lang.String shareToRemove,
                      int toBeSold,
                      java.lang.String date)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sells the specified number of shares of the specified company.
        Parameters:
        shareToRemove - is the ticker symbol of the company
        toBeSold - is the number the shares
        date - on which share is to be sold
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are multiple shares of the same company bought on different dates or the specified ShareCompany does not exists in the portfolio

      • sellShare

        public void sellShare(java.lang.String shareToRemove,
                      double cost,
                      java.lang.String date)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sells the shares of specified cost of the specified company.
        Parameters:
        shareToRemove - is the ticker symbol of the company
        cost - is the cost of the shares
        date - on which share is to be sold
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the shares of the specified cost does not exists

      • sellShare

        public void sellShare(java.lang.String shareToRemove,
                      int toBeSold,
                      double cost,
                      java.lang.String date)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sells the specified number of shares of the specified cost of the specified company.
        Parameters:
        shareToRemove - is the ticker symbol of the company whose shares need to be sold
        toBeSold - Qty of shares that need to be sold
        cost - of the shares that need to be sold
        date - on which share is to be sold
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the qty of shares is more than the available shares to be sold or if the specified shares are not available in the portfolio

      • getState

        public java.lang.String getState()
        Displays all the details of the specified existing portfolios.
        Returns:
        the following details of the portfolio - Portfolio Name - Total Investment TotalReturn - Total Profit - Profit Rate - Share Name - Cost Basis - Number of Shares Total Cost of Basis
